entry.title: Hi!
entry.summary: This is Hüseyin speaking! I am an indie developer from İstanbul, Turkey. I am interested in learning about and experimenting with new technologies. I have had experience with JavaScript, HTML, CSS, NodeJS, PHP, VB, and Python.
entry.content:
This is Hüseyin speaking!

I am an indie developer from İstanbul, Turkey. I am interested in learning about and experimenting with new technologies. 

I have had experience with JavaScript, HTML, CSS, NodeJS, PHP, VB, and Python.

entry.title: About
entry.summary: Hi there! My name is Hüseyin Demirtaş. I am an indie developer based in İstanbul, Turkey. I love experimenting with new technologies. This static site is built by using Publii. Make sure to give it a try.
entry.content:
Hi there!

My name is Hüseyin Demirtaş. I am an indie developer based in İstanbul, Turkey. I love experimenting with new technologies.

This static site is built by using Publii. Make sure to give it a try.
